page.title: 18Majorettes
page.content: There are two majorette troupes in Grimethorpe.Grimethorpe Majorettes founded in 1979 and Grimethorpe Union Coronets Jazzband which developed from a local morris dancing troupe.The two troupes enter competitions each weekend from Easter to October and train three or four nights each week.Each troupe appears by invitation at the many galas held in the area and as far afield as Blackpool and Skegness.Girls are transported in their own coaches to competitions and displays.Majorette competitions usually begin at 10.a.m. and after each troupe has given a 20 minute display the winners in each section is known about 5.p.m. Both troupes organise full-day competitions in Grimethorpe each year.
